## Problem
What problem does this solve? Why do you need this feature?

## Proposed Solution
What you'd like to see implemented.

## Alternatives Considered
Other ways you've thought about solving this.

## Alignment Check
- [ ] This aligns with the "AI-native, minimal CMS" philosophy
- [ ] This can't easily be a plugin or external tool
- [ ] This adds meaningful value without significant complexity

## Additional Context
Any other relevant information, mockups, or examples.
